pages.title: Poisonous Essence
pages.text: $(li)Poisonous Essence is a needed ingredient to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/alexsmobs/poison_resistance)Potion of Poison Resistance$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be brewed using a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/rattlesnake_rattle)Rattlesnake Rattle$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Potion of Poisons$(/l) as ingredients in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l).
